video.title: Inside: Secret America
video.synopsis: Two journalists go deep inside America's underground networks to investigate controversial worlds rarely seen by the public.

episodes.synopsis: Recreational designer drugs composed of white powder, granules or crystals become wildly popular in America, bringing profit and devastating harm.
episodes.title: Bath Salts

episodes.synopsis: A path is traced to reveal how guns that are gathered in underground tunnels in Mexico end up in the hands of dangerous criminals.
episodes.title: Armed & Undercover

episodes.synopsis: The world of sex trafficking is exposed in a close-up look at America's prostitution tracks, illegal massage parlors and the traffickers themselves.
episodes.title: American Sex Slave

episodes.synopsis: The heated and complex debate between proponents of the animal agricultural industry and the animal rights movement is explored.
episodes.title: Animal Undercover

episodes.synopsis: A look into the nation's most haunted spots tries to explain America's obsession with the paranormal as well as other phenomena that defy reason.
episodes.title: Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: A seldom-seen world is explored, where homeless youngsters struggle for survival against a backdrop of wealth, ambition and the American dream.
episodes.title: Hollywood Homeless
